ValidationRule.description: Milestones required for NB opps stage 3
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( contains($Profile.Name, "Sales"), ISPICKVAL(Plan__c, "Enterprise"), ISPICKVAL(Type, "New Business"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "3 - Present Solution"), Stage_Number__c > PRIORVALUE(Stage_Number__c),
OR( H_Technical_Evaluation_POV_completed__c = FALSE, I_Info_secured_to_develop_proposal__c = FALSE, J_Customer_completed_a_BVA_or_BVA_lite__c = FALSE ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please check milestones H, I, & J to advance to stage 3
